content:
Yes, some of these recommended restaurants have outdoor seating with beautiful views. Here are some options:

1. Kauai Hukilau - This oceanfront restaurant has outdoor seating overlooking the beautiful Pacific Ocean. 2. Hanalei Taro & Juice Co. - This cafe has a lovely outdoor seating area surrounded by lush tropical foliage. 3. Bar Acuda - This restaurant has a rooftop terrace with beautiful views of Hanalei Bay and the surrounding mountains. 4. The Greenery Cafe - This vegetarian cafe has a lovely outdoor courtyard with a view of the Waimea River. 5. Pono Market - While Pono Market doesn't have outdoor seating, it's located in the charming town of Kapaa on Kauai's east side, where you can enjoy some outdoor dining and people-watching. Please note that outdoor seating with views may not always be available or may require reservations in advance, especially during peak tourist season.
